text: Humne dozakh ke yeh karkoon farishtey banaye hain,aur unki tadaad ko kafiron ke liye fitna bana diya hai, taa-ke ehle kitaab ko yaqeen aa jaye aur iman laney walon ka iman badhey,Aur ehle kitaab aur momineen kisi shakk mein na rahey,aur dil ke bimar aur kuffar yeh kahein ke bhala Allah ka is ajeeb baat se kya matlab ho sakta hai. Is tarah Allah jisey chahta hai gumraah kardeta hai aur jisey chahta hai hidayat baksh deta hai aur tere Rubb ke lashkaron (soldiers) ko khud uske siwa koi nahin janta, aur is dozak ka zikr iske siwa kisi garz ke liye nahin kiya gaya hai ke logon ko issey naseehat ho
